summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein discussing travel plans and mentioning interactions with business families in Egypt. The email highlights the confidentiality of the communication and includes disclaimers regarding its content.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing his travel plans and interactions with business families.

events.title: Travel Plans Discussion
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein discusses his travel plans and mentions being in contact with business families in Egypt.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is planning to be in a location until Friday night and is leaving on Sunday morning.
The email mentions a potential issue related to the FBI.
Epstein is in communication with two of the largest business families in Egypt.
The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.
